Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.recommendations: Apply copper-based bactericides. Remove and destroy affected plant parts.
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.preventiveMeasures: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead irrigation, and practice crop rotation.

Pepper__bell___healthy.recommendations: No treatment needed. Continue maintaining optimal growing conditions.
Pepper__bell___healthy.preventiveMeasures: Ensure proper watering, provide balanced fertilization, and monitor for pests regularly.

Potato___Early_blight.recommendations: Apply fungicides such as chlorothalonil or mancozeb. Remove and destroy infected leaves to reduce spread.
Potato___Early_blight.preventiveMeasures: Use resistant potato varieties, maintain good soil drainage, and avoid working in fields when foliage is wet.

Potato___Late_blight.recommendations: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil or copper-based products. Remove and destroy infected plant debris.
Potato___Late_blight.preventiveMeasures: Use resistant potato varieties, ensure proper spacing for air circulation, and avoid overhead watering.

Potato___healthy.recommendations: No treatment needed. Maintain current care practices.
Potato___healthy.preventiveMeasures: Ensure consistent watering, apply balanced fertilization, and regularly check for early signs of pests or disease.
